Description:
Whether it's those intense couch battles playing Mario Kart, chilled sessions with Stardew Valley or franticly building barricades in Fortnite, Gamepad.Club is for you. However you play, this place is a home for everything gaming. Join us and chat about the latest releases, what you’re currently playing, and what upcoming launches you’re hyped for!

Don't worry about staying on topic though. Create an account, share your interests in an introductory post, and enjoy being part of a growing community on a network of connected Mastodon instances around the globe!

Signing up for an account is free, although there are some ground rules that you'll see below. So that we can tell you're a human and not some basic bot, please include a reason for joining. Once checked and manually approved, you'll get an email inviting you to get started!

How Gamepad.Club is Run

To support our growing and active community, this server is moderated by a team of volunteers. It currently consists of the following, who are all on-hand to respond to your queries:

  • Gazimoff (owner, admin)
  • Belghast (co-admin)
  • Aywren (mod)
  • Scopique (mod)

This instance of Mastodon is powered by Linode cloud computing using industrial-grade data centres and infrastructure. Backups are taken daily and rotated to ensure that data is protected.

We also adhere to the Mastodon Server Covenant, including providing at least 3 months notice should the server regrettably plan to shut down. This will provide ample opportunity if you want to download your content and/or move to another instance.

While we're on the topic, please remember that anything you publish on Gamepad.Club (your posts and images) is stored unencrypted. This includes Direct Messages and other closed/locked posts. Please do not use this service to share anything confidential or personal that you cannot risk becoming public.

Gamepad.Club is currently funded out-of-pocket by the admin team, with support from incredibly generous members via Patreon. Advance notice will be shared if that needs to change, but members will never be charged for access, adverts will never be used, trackers will never be deployed and data will never be sold to third-parties.
Short: Gamepad.Club has a video games focus, but we're open to all forms of gaming from tabletop RPGs to trading card games. Hosted in the UK and EU but everyone is welcome!

Description:
【サーバについて】


2019年4月に終了したGoogle+の移住先の一つとして重度のG+erが立てた日本人G+er向きのMastodonサーバです。あくまでMastodonをベースとしているのでG+ほどの性能機能はありませんので予めご了承ください。

【運営について】


管理人である、あきょぜ (@akyoz) が個人で行っております。
運営費も私財から出ておりますが、かなりきつくならない限りは寄付等も受け取らない予定です。
なお、モデレーター（不適切コンテンツへの対応者）はいつでも募集中です。

【セキュリティについて】


本サーバではWebサーバ、DBサーバ、Storageサーバ間の通信は全て暗号化および接続制限を設けており、WebサーバはCDN/WAFサービスによりもう一段階の暗号化を行う環境を構築する等セキュリティとプライバシーに配慮した設計となっておりますが、それでも心配な場合は利用をご遠慮ください。

また、ユーザ情報はローカルに保持せず、安全かつ高性能なGCPのマネージドサービスを使用、加えてパスワードはハッシュ化を実施した上で保管しておりますが、メールアドレス情報だけはユーザ認証のため平文で保管しています。そのため、登録されるメールアドレスはご注意ください
アカウント乗っ取り等の対策として、二段階認証を設けておりますので是非ご利用ください。

【プライバシーについて】


Cookieの取得および、サービス向上のため利用者からのアクセス解析(GoogleAnalytics)を行っています。
また、登録の際に使用されたメールアドレスは管理者からは見えてしまいますのでご承知置きをお願いします。
ただし、それ以外の情報についてはMastodonの精神に則り、収集・解析を行ないません。

詳しくは利用規約内のプライバシーポリシーをご確認ください。

【トラブルや不適切と思われる投稿があった場合】


個人間のトラブルについては、個人間で解決をお願いします。
ただ、サーバ全体・他サーバに迷惑がかかるレベルのトラブルが発生した場合はアカウント停止等の対処をする可能性がありますので、ご承知おきください。
また不適切と思われる投稿を見かけた際は、通報機能を使用していただければ対処します。
※2021/08/08 追記事項
当サーバのCDNとして使用している『Cloudflare』の児童ポルノ検知サービスである『CSAM 検出ツール』を採用しています。このツールは当サーバおよび、外部のサーバにて、米国が定める児童性的虐待コンテンツ (CSAM)が受信されたことを検知するもので、当サーバに該当のコンテンツがキャッシュされた場合に早期に削除することを目的としています。
なお、このCSAMとは実際の被害者がでている児童ポルノの画像データを対象とするデータベースであり、いわゆる二次元を対象とする非実在青少年のポルノ作品を対象とするものではありません。

本ツールによって直ちにアップロード者へ逮捕等されるものではありませんが、悪質な場合は全米行方不明・被搾取児童センター (NCMEC) 経由で、データをアップロードした人に対して公権力による調査等が行われる可能性があります。
他サーバの管理者様および、当サーバの利用を検討される方の中で本ツールに対しての危険だと判断される方は、ドメインブロックや利用をしない等の対応をおとりいただくよう各位予めご了承ください。

RULES

  1. Harshing @anthracite’s buzz will get you banned.
  2. Dragons are awesome.
  3. An it harm none, do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the law.
  4. Be Excellent To One Another.
  5. So it hath been spoken, so it hath been written, and so shall it be. Consecrated by Ye Holy Herb Of Ye Glacier Goo, in the Year Of Our Silicon Lady Number Five.

Things that may harsh @anthracite’s buzz

(aka Code Of Conduct):

  1. forgetting to tag politics
  2. being a nazi
  3. dragons being jerks to mammals (or to each other, but especially to the mammals)
  4. also non-dragons being jerks to anyone, just don't be a jerk, okay?
  5. also please be aware that @anthracite only speaks English and may thus be a lot less nuanced in her use of the banhammer if you're being a jerk to someone in another language
  6. doxxing, brigading, death threats, all that 4chan/ljdrama/kiwifarms edgelord shit
  7. posting nsfw stuff (especially Actual Human Nakeds)without a content warning
  8. posting anything that's illegal in my state (currently Louisiana) or yours
  9. being @anthracite’s significant other
  10. re-posting private messages, here or elsewhere
  11. being a corporation, or being sponsored by one
  12. posting sigils/subliminals/strobes without a content warning
  13. constant shitposting
  14. failing to be thoughtful, considerate, and polite in your disagreement if you happen to disagree with what someone else is saying
  15. evading bans/blocks/no-contact orders via multiple accounts, on this server or others (multiple systems please note: this applies to all accounts belonging to all members/systems/headmates of your system)
  16. questioning @anthracite's moderation/federation decisions, especially if you use the terms "virtue signalling" or "filter bubble" whilst doing so
  17. posting AI-generated art, it is okay if there is some buried deep in your art process but if you are a "prompt engineer" who spends 90% of their time on a piece typing stuff into a text input box then you are not welcome here
  18. giving @anthracite cause to expand the list of actions that are explicitly forbidden here

TL;DR

Imagine you have a cool queer trans aunt who is a cartoon dragon sometimes. Don't do anything that'd probably piss her off.

Also, we generally silence any instance that claims to be dedicated to "free speech", as in practice this usually means it is happy to host hate speech. Life's too short for that shit.

SOMETHING LIKE TERMS OF SERVICE:

This is an experiment. We currently make no promises as to the safety of any data you post to this site, nor to its persistence. Shit happens.

We do, however, promise not to try to monetize your attention with advertisements. We also promise not to share your private data with any other people, government agencies, or corporate entities. Well, we might share your data if the government comes knocking with a big pile of lawyers. We haven't had that happen yet.

We also don't want to dig into your private messages. That said, if someone is claiming you're harassing them in PMs, we will have a look at them. Please try not to make us have to look. Also, keep in mind that private messages are not encrypted, and other servers are not guaranteed to respect the 'this is private' marker. I would not advise talking about anything illegal here until the Mastodon project solves this.

It's up to you if you trust us to keep these promises. "We" is currently just @anthracite, a trans lady in her mid-forties.

"IF YOU'RE NOT PAYING FOR IT, YOU'RE THE PRODUCT"

The whole model of commercial social networks has been "make money by selling your attention to advertisers, as increasingly-more-specific market segments". This has a lot of problems.

Right now, running this thing costs me about $27/month, which is pocket change for me. But if you'd like to help out then I've set up a Patreon.

Alternatively: make crazy porn of one of my fursonas happen (with or without your fursona, check out my FA faves to see if our impossible fantasy kinks overlap), or make a donation to the Southern Poverty Law Center or your local chapter of the Democratic Socialist Party. Or just take some spare money out of the bank and give it to someone near you who needs it more than either of us. ♥

Also you can just throw some money at me via Paypal or Ko-fi. Whatever. None of this is mandatory but it is certainly appreciated.

Description:
Server for all music enthusiasts. Concerts, festivals, new music discovery, music collectors, artists, music charts etc.

Registrations only for people aiming to primarily post about music-related subjects.

Code of Conduct

(For the rules scroll down below!!)

This Code contains the rules and principles for participating in the Musicworld.social community. It is intended to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible. This is a working document, so the Musicworld.social team may amend it from time to time.

Goals

  • Provide a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for everyone regardless of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristic.
  • Create a supportive community, where people freely share their passions and are excited and positive about each other’s successes.
  • Protect our community from harassment, malicious or illegal content and from individual members whose goals are to disrupt our community and promote their own self-interest at the expense of the community.

Principles that Guide us

  • We are not a free speech zone. This CoC lays out expected standards of conduct and behavior. You cannot say or post anything that violates these rules or principles and remain a member of our community. You must follow this CoC. If you are looking for something else, please do. It is not here.
  • The Moderators are not morality or thought police. Moderators are guided by this Code of Conduct. Post what you want, if what you post follows these rules, principles and the goals outlined above. Not every member of the community will appreciate controversial or explicit posts so use Content Warnings very liberally. We use Content Warnings so community members themselves can decide whether they want to see or engage with a post that may be controversial or explicit.
  • Bullies, trolls and disruptors are not welcome in Musicworld.social. We will moderate accordingly.
  • This is a voluntary community. You chose to be here. When you choose to join, you have implied that you agree with this Code of Conduct and will follow it.

Rules for posting

The rules you need to follow if you want to be a member of our community are stated below.

General guidance on posting and participating in Mastodon.world

  • Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning. Ideally, you would not post about inflammatory subjects at all. However, it may be acceptable to do so in some cases, but it is never acceptable to post inflammatory content without hiding the content behind an appropriate Content Warning.
  • Do not post any type of nudity without a Content Warning.
  • Regarding Spam: We are not your free advertising platform. If you are here only to sell your products or services, you will be removed. Occasional posts of commercial links are OK, but when the vast majority of a user's posts are commercial in nature, we regard the account as a Spam account. Moderators will evaluate reports of Spam on a case by case basis.
  • Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour. Criticize ideas, never people.
  • Do not report every post that upsets you. Please report posts that violate our rules but for others that you may find distasteful, or just don’t like, use the tools available to you. You can block the user or mute the conversation.

Moderation Principles

Reported content will be assessed on a balance of probabilities by the moderators. In other words, whether it is more likely than not that the content violates one or more of these rules. Moderators will suspend an account from mastodon.world when the user demonstrates that they have breached any rule several times, or if their content (including profile description) suggests that they are likely to continue to break the rules. The number of breaches leading to suspension is deliberately not defined. In egregious cases, one breach can result in suspension of the user account.

The moderation team takes a pragmatic approach to every report they receive - if they feel that a problematic post isn’t explicitly a breach of any of these rules but is inappropriate for Mastodon.world, the post will likely be removed. Users who repeatedly post problematic content or otherwise are seen by the moderators as a negative, disruptive presence in our community can be removed at the discretion of the moderation team, even if those posts or the user did not explicitly violate our rules.

Donations & Finances

Musicworld.social is run by @ruud, who also pays the bills.
Since the November 2022 user influx, those bills have gone up quite steeply.
For those who would like to contribute, the following options for donations are available:

  • OpenCollective (Either recurring or one-time donations) - Preferred.
  • Patreon (Recurring donations only)

The running costs of Mastodon currently consist of:

  • Hetzner server
  • Hetzner backup server
  • Hetzner cloud VPS for monitoring, blog etc
  • Mailgun e-mailer
  • Wasabi storage

Monthly updates about the finances can be found at our blog

Description:
Goonj India is an open, privacy conscious community focussed on Indians and India specific issues.

Goonj India is part of the Goonj network of community. Anyone can join and find the right community to participate.

Open

Goonj is open for everyone to join, but hate speech of any kind is prohibited. Goonj can be joined through any device through our web application. Goonj is open source and based on the popular Mastodon social network.

Privacy Conscious

Users can seamlessly download their entire account data and delete their accounts any time they want. No private information like Real Name, Date of Birth etc. is required to join Goonj. Goonj provides easy control to share your content with a limited audience or to a wider audience as required.

Code of Conduct

Try to be a good neighbour to everyone in the community. Please avoid all behaviour which can be considered spamming, scamming, ponography, NSFW content, advocacy of violence, ethnic/racial/homophobic slurs, harassment, or any other content/activity deemed against the law. Offending content will need to be removed by the user, and repeat offenders will be banned from the community.

We strive to be "work-friendly", so if you post anything that's allowable under our policy but may reasonably be considered objectionable, please use a CW (content warning) to tag it as such.

Moderation activities will be as transparent as possible, with rationales for each action. The community will have the opportunity to review and give input on actions, and the moderation team will be responsive to that.

* Nudity exceptions - the following are okay: Nudity in photos of paintings and sculptures; Breastfeeding (with content warning); Nudity in photos of political expression or significance (with content warning). Examples that don't qualify as exceptions: Nudity in digital art; Nudity with political text simply added to it; etc.


FAQ

How to invite people to follow you

Go to Invites. Check Invite to follow your account, and generate a link. People who sign up through the invite will automatically follow you!

How to enable/disable email notifications

Go to Notifications

Recommended: Enable all notifications to start with; then, if there are any you find you don't like, disable them.

How to export all your data

Go to Data export

Description:
triangletoot.party

This Mastodon instance is intended for those who have an interest in the Triangle region of North Carolina. You aren't required to live here in order to join, but please mention why you want to join triangletoot.party in particular if you apply to join. There are lots of general instances out there, and your request will be denied if you give a generic response to that question. If you have a friend who is already a part of this server, they can send you an invite.

Getting started

This official Mastodon guide will help explain all the different parts of Mastodon, but here's a quick rundown:

  • Toot* = post (like Twitter's tweet)
  • Boost = show that post on your profile (like Twitter's retweet)
  • Favorite = show appreciation for a post (like Twitter's like)
  • Home = posts from people you follow
  • Local = posts from everybody on triangletoot.party
  • Federated = posts from everybody known to triangletoot.party

Suggested first steps

  • Add a profile picture
  • Post a toot! Tell us a little bit about yourself and make sure to add the #introduction tag to your post so others can find you.
  • Filter out languages to your liking (especially useful for the federated timeline)
  • Browse the local and federated timelines for people to follow

How do I find people to follow?

  • Browse local profiles to find users on triangletoot.party.
  • Check out Trunk to find individuals.
  • Check out Guppe to find and follow people with similar interests.

Funding

This instance is funded by @autumn@triangletoot.party. Donations for running the server and moderation can be made here: https://liberapay.com/triangletoot.party.

Prohibited content

This content is prohibited by the hosting service, Masto.host.

  • Illegal activity
  • Sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions
  • Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • National Socialism
  • Nazism
  • Holocaust denial
  • Racism
  • Alt right, including under the disguise of freedom of speech
  • Gender-critical
  • Sex and gender discrimination
  • Transphobia
  • Misogyny
  • Pro-ana / Pro-mia
  • Automated sharing of third-party content, news sources, websites or social media content that doesn’t belong to you
  • Trolling, insulting and derogatory comments towards others outside your server
  • Mass following and aggregation of content

Credits

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.

Footnotes

* Toots are now called "posts" in the codebase, but colloquially they are still sometimes referred to as toots.

Description:
LORE è l’istanza Bookwyrm di Livello Segreto.

Qui potrete condividere le nostre letture, scoprire nuovi libri da leggere, organizzare bookclub e coltivare amicizie letterarie. È di fatto un piccolo social network dedicato ai libri, ma integrato nel fediverso. Quello che fate qui potrà facilmente essere seguito e condiviso su Mastodon e affini.

Pensiamo che la lettura sia importante, tanto per l’intrattenimento quanto per il progresso, e proprio per questo riteniamo fondamentale che ci sia uno spazio libero in cui condividerla.

LORE è libero per vari motivi: - È open source - Non raccoglie i vostri dati - È moderato e gestito da esseri umani, non da una corporazione - Non ha scopo di lucro

Esattamente come Livello Segreto, LORE è un luogo di rispetto, antirazzismo, antisessismo, antifascismo. Insomma, comportatevi bene e abbiate a cuore la serenità dellǝ altrǝ utenti. Qui potete trovare le regole complete di Livello Segreto.

We're creating a safe space for naked content creators and activists.

Welcome to The Body Social, a small community dedicated to naked content creators and activists looking for a space to explore and share simple, non-sexual nudity inside the fediverse.

Audience

Mastodon and the fediverse, collectively, encompass around 11 million users and around 1.8 million active users per month (source: FediDB). Our community is intentionally small, but has access to 25,000 other communities which can be seamlessly followed and posted to from the comfort of The Body Social.

Moderation

Keeping a safe space for naked content creators requires moderation that can't commonly be found in larger communities. We're here to treat our members with care and help them grow by moderating from a philosophy compatible with their own.

Our beliefs

  • You only get one body, so enjoy it
  • Be in tune with your body on a deeper level
  • Health and happiness above the expectations of others
  • Unwind the association of sexuality and nudity
  • Clothing is optional and that choice shouldn't diminish your dignity

Naturism

A lot of our members tend to come with a background in naturism. You can read more about that at naturism.is.

Our service promise to you

Our top priorities are to keep your data backed up and safe and your experience here seamless and uninterrupted.

How we're funded

Description:
Welcome!

This Mastodon instance was created in December 2022 for /r/neoliberal as part of the broader neoliber.al domain as a reward for reaching a milestone during our charity drive. While primarily a spinoff of the subreddit, we welcome new accounts from anyone who is looking for a community based on liberal values

New to Mastodon? You can learn more about it here. In short, this is an independently-run social media website that can communicate with other such websites using the ActivityPub protocol. If you create an account here, you can follow and chat with people on any other Mastodon instance and even on other social media platforms such as Lemmy and Pixelfed. This network is known as the "Fediverse" and is home to over 1.5 million monthly active users

mastodon.social is the most popular instance, so why make an account here? First, it gives you access to our local community feed of people who have also decided to create an account here (100% good takes guaranteed or your money back). Second, as a small community, you can get direct support from the admins and a say in how moderation is handled. And lastly, thanks in part to the software Chuckya and glitch-soc, we have some extra features here not found on other Mastodon instances including:

  • Gigachad Obama emoji
  • Markdown formatting
  • Local-only posts
  • Doodle posts
  • Emoji reactions
  • Tenor GIF selector
  • Optional Mastodon Modern Theme (source)

Some Mastodon apps will not support all these features, but the website always works

Moderation

This instance is actively moderated and reports are usually responded to within 12 hours. We do not allow racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or bad stuff in general

As a user, Mastodon has powerful tools for deciding what content you want to see, including word filters, blocking accounts, and blocking entire instances. As such, our current policy is to only perform site-wide blocks of other instances for spam, harassment, hate speech, and illegal or otherwise highly-objectionable content. Please reach out if you think a server has been wrongfully blocked

In the future it may be possible to communicate with Bluesky and Threads. Some instances intend to block communication with these services because they're for-profit corporate entities, but we don't have any plans to do so

Privacy

We use the default Mastodon privacy policy. Please do not make an account here if you are under 13 or if handling your information as described in the privacy policy is otherwise illegal

It is not required to sign in to see posts made on this server. Therefore, blocking someone prevents them from replying to you, but does not stop them from reading your posts. This also means that posts made here can show up in search engine results or be archived by third parties (eg. Internet Archive's Wayback Machine). This is the same as how Reddit operates. If you're looking for more privacy, you'll want to find a Mastodon instance that supports what's known as "authorized fetch"

Administration

A minimum of 90 days notice will be given if this instance is going to shut down, and backups are automatically performed daily. That said, we are not fully compliant with the Mastodon Server Covenant due to only one person having access to the server infrastructure

Server hosting and services are provided by Digital Ocean and Amazon AWS. Monthly costs are approximately $40. We are not accepting donations at this time, but if you would like to support the growth of Mastodon as a whole, consider contributing to the Mastodon gGmbH Patreon or another small instance

This instance is not affiliated with the Mastodon gGmbH nonprofit corporation. Accordingly, please direct all issues regarding the content on or moderation of this instance (eg. DMCA, GDPR, ban appeals, server blocks, tech support) to jenbanim@gmail.com

Description:
Updates on site status, ToS/CoC changes, and so forth will be announced from @instance@a2mi.social.

Donations

This site costs roughly $100 per month to run. If you'd like to contribute, you can send some money to the site administrator (Chris Dzombak) via:

  • PayPal at paypal.me/chrisdzombak
  • Venmo at @dzombak

To support development of the open-source Mastodon software, consider contributing to the Mastodon Patreon.

Conduct, Content, and Moderation Policies

Terms of Service

All users are expected to follow the site rules, and repeated or serious violations will lead to account suspension.

Creation of multiple accounts in order to avoid or evade moderation actions is not allowed. Violations will lead to suspension of all your accounts.

Regardless of your a2mi.social account status:

  • Usage that may undermine users’ security and privacy expectations (like scraping, indexing, or followbots) is not permitted.
  • Usage that enables harassment, abuse, hate speech, spamming, or that enables violation of any other site rule is likewise disallowed.
  • Usage that violates or aims to subvert the server-level moderation policies is not allowed.

Violations may result in suspension of your account, suspension of federation with your server, or network-level blocks, with no warning.

Reporting Accounts

When reporting accounts, please include a few posts that show rule-breaking behavior, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please note that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Server-level Moderation

To provide a pleasant space for the community, we block federation at the server level with Mastodon sites known to:

  • Present security or privacy risks
  • Enable hate speech, violent speech, or other violent/hateful ideologies
  • Enable harassment or abuse
  • Propagate dangerous conspiracy theories
  • Tolerate/host content that's illegal in the US
  • Enable spamming

These blocks are largely based on the list available at joinfediverse.wiki/FediBlock.

Site News

Updates on site status, ToS and CoC changes, and so forth will be provided through the Instance News account: @instance@a2mi.social.

If the site is offline, check status.a2mi.social, which is hosted on an external service, for news.

Songbird は特に決まったテーマの無い Mastodon サーバーですが、生活や社会、文化全般の話題に興味のある方に向いています。

多様な方々が安心して過ごせる場所を目指しています。

少し便利な Mastodon

このサーバーでは Mastodon Glitch Edition という、普通の Mastodon にいくつか機能を追加したものを使っています。例えば、

Welcome! 🐤

Songbird is a general Mastodon server suitable to those who are interested in daily life and social topics.

Feel free to sign up and toot as long as you agree to obey our server rules.

Additional Features

  • "Local-only" toots: visible only for people on this server
  • Formatted toots: you can write Markdown and HTML
  • Additional UI customization
  • Hiding follower count

Description:
Super-Gay is a queer-oriented Mastodon. The goal is to provide a safe space for queer folk and allies.

Code of Conduct
Short Version
I try to handle moderation ASAP, but it may take a few hours to handle your request/report.

I am not a free speech absolutist, and there are instances available for that. I’m not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech of any sort, which I will define at my sole discretion. No homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, racism allowed.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Long Version
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of super-gay.co; I am here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service.

Content Warnings and Sensitive Media

The Content Warning (CW) policy is intended to make the server comfortable for the community.

Content Warnings are a feature of Mastodon that enable you to hide the body of a "toot" (post) behind a line of text. The intended use of this feature is to provide a way to discuss sensitive and/or potentially harmful topics without causing duress or harm to anyone who might stumble upon it, though content warnings may be used for a wide variety of reasons.

Images can be marked as sensitive. This is a feature which hides an image until a warning banner is clicked. Images may be marked as sensitive separately from Content Warnings, though using a Content Warning automatically marks the toot's images as sensitive.

Please note that our sensitive media rules apply to profile photos and headers as well. Since those images cannot be hidden behind sensitive media warnings, they are not allowed to contain content from enforced content warnings. We cannot enforce content warnings on users from other instances, but can help to manage content that you see when reported to instance moderators. Please be clear and accurate when labeling content warnings, to ensure that they follow both the letter and spirit of the enforcements that we have. Above all, try to be polite, and come from a place of mutual respect when discussing content warnings with others.

Enforced Content Warnings:

  • NSFW/sexual discussion and imagery must be behind descriptive CWs (nudity, sex, kink discussion, etc)
  • Sensitive imagery (please use your best judgement on what content that most other users would find sensitive, such as photos of surgeries, abuse, war, deceased individuals, etc)
  • Triggering topics (direct discussion of rape, trauma, abuse, suicide, transphobia, homophobia, etc.).
  • Drugs or drug use.

I do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of NFTs on this instance. I do not allow content from this instance, including content and media uploaded by the community members, to be sold as NFTs.

Staff
This instance is administered by the site owner, @kilcannon.

Attribution
I leveraged a significant portion of tech.lgbt’s code of conduct to help frame super-gay.co’s user expectations. A big thank you for their efforts.

If you would like to expand this Mastodon instance to more users, consider helping cover the additional server costs here:
Sponsor A Queer

Description:
Masto BG е един от първите българоезични сървъри на децентрализираната социална мрежа Mastodon. Нашата цел е да създадем среда за българи, които искат да избягат от токсичността на корпоративните социални мрежи, най-вече Facebook.

Защо трябва да се откъснем от Facebook?

Доминацията на Facebook в България е безспорна. Към момента във Facebook има 4,3 милиона български потребители, което е около 65% от цялото население на страната.

Алгоритмите на Facebook насърчават разпространението на дезинформация, фалшиви новини и радикално съдържание, което дестабилизира нашето общество.

Изключително притеснителна е и тенденцията алгоритмите на Facebook да се експлоатират от руски агенти за разпространението на дезинформация, което във време на война е буквална заплаха за националната сигурност на България.

За жалост Meta са показали цялостно нежелание да адресират тези проблеми и вместо да ограничават разпространението на дестабилизиращо съдържание, техните алгоритми му дават тласък, докато същевременно модераторската политика заглушава автентични граждански гласове.

Защо Mastodon предоставя алтернатива?

Борбата с корпоративни гиганти като Meta е почти непосилна за държави като България. Произволът, който си позволяват тези големи компании, е заплаха за тъканта на обществата по света.

Mastodon е най-голямата децентрализирана социална мрежа, която не се притежава от нито една корпорация, а от хиляди администратори на сървъри по целия свят.

Разбира се, тези администратори могат да упражняват авторитарен контрол върху своите потребители. Но в Mastodon потребителят винаги има избор да се премести на друг сървър само с един клик и да запази всичките си последователи. Това значи, че сървър, който злоупотребява със своите модераторски правомощия ще бъде бързо напуснат от всичките си потребители. Никоя корпоративна социална мрежа не може да се похвали със същото.

От друга страна, на който и сървър да се намираш, ти си част от Fediverse, тоест всички сме на една мрежа, дори и да сме на различни сървъри. Всеки потребител може да следва потребители от всеки друг сървър и да споделя тяхното съдържание.

Това означава, че Mastodon ни предоставя алтернатива на централизираните социални мрежи. Тук можем да намерим баланса между свобода на словото и модерация на съдържанието.

Модераторска философия

Цялостният ни стремеж е да създадем общност, в която хората да могат да споделят мислите си, да водят конструктивни диалози и да си прекарват приятно, без да им бъдат насаждани постоянно гняв, страх, омраза.

Ако сте мили, учтиви, уравновесени и не разпространявате руска или фашистка пропаганда, няма нужда да се притеснявате от модераторската ни политика.

Информация за собственост

Masto BG е собственост на Блу Дот Технолоджис ЕООД, еднолично дружество, собственост на Благослав Михайлов, с ЕИК 204744767, седалище и адрес на управление град София, бул „Цариградско шосе“ №133.

Description:
About

tldr.nettime is an instance for artists, researchers, and activists interested in exploring the intersections of technology, culture, and politics.

It has grown out of nettime-l, one of the longest-running mailing lists on the net with a focus on the 'cultural politics of the internet'.

nettime.org

Server

tldr.nettime is based on Hometown, a fork of Mastodon. It's compatible with the wider fediverse, but it also offers two tweaks we hope will help make it particularly engaging and fostering a shared sense of place:

  • The character count per message is higher — 2000 chars at the moment.
  • You can choose whether your post is public or visible only on tldr's local timeline

We try to run a stable server, but this is a community effort, so we don't provide guarantees for uptime.

Funding

The server is run by care and free labor of everyone involved. To cover infrastructure cost, we need donations. If you value this instance and have some money to contribute, please do so.

The best way is to send money directly to our bank account.

Account holder: TLDR Association
IBAN: CH50 0900 0000 1607 0884 6
BIC: POFICHBEXXX

You can also a donation form (link to donorbox.org), though processing fees are considerably higher.

Guidelines

Please read the information below before signing up to and/or using tldr.nettime. If you don’t agree to the terms set out here, please do not use this server. It's that simple.

We have a commitment to critical analysis, experiments, mutual care, diversity, and anti-discriminatory practices. The instance is lightly moderated, on an account basis. In other words, we will ban accounts that don't share our commitment.

The community will give itself more detailed rules if necessary.

Language: There are no language rules on this server. English is de facto the main language, but feel free (even encouraged!) to post in other languages.

Content warnings: We do not require a content warning (CW). However, we ask that you be kind and considerate: include CWs if you believe your post may be distressing to others.

Bots: Bots are allowed. Try to make them fun.

Cross-posting: Cross-posting from Twitter, RSS, etc. is fine (and even encouraged if it helps you become more active here).

Topics: You do not need to remain permanently "on topic". The point of this community is to gather like-minded people who will make posts that are interesting to each other. But that doesn't mean that everything has to be about the 'cultural politics of the internet' (whatever that is....). This is a community to connect people, not enforce specific topics of discussion.

Self-promotion: There are many writers, artists, and other cultural producers on this server, and we are more than happy for you to promote your work from your personal account. We request, however, that you do so in a tasteful and not spammy manner.

(Guidelines adapted from zirk.us)

Impressum

This server is run by "TLDR Association", a non-profit association (based on Art. 60ff Swiss Civil Code), registered in Switzerland.
